text: On 5 August 2022, Israel launched a large amount of surpriseBethan McKernan, Hazem Balousha, 'Fears of all-out conflict as second Palestinian militant killed in Israeli airstrike,' The Guardian 7 August 2022 airstrikes on the Gaza Strip. They were targeting militants of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad movement (PIJ). The operation, called Breaking Dawn by the Israel Defense Forces (IDF). It lasted a week and began on 1 August raid on Jenin.'Israeli forces arrest senior Islamic Jihad leader in the raid that kills Palestinian youth,' Middle East Eye 1 August 2022. ==References== Category:August 2022 events Category:2022 in Asia Category:2020s in Israel
